claim: Disabling nested loops causes >4x regression on star queries with dimension index lookups
evidence_summary: 8/10 queries with nested loop baseline regress >4x when no_nestloop applied
boundaries: Applies when baseline uses nested loops for dimension PK lookups
mechanism: Nested loops exploit dim PK indexes for point lookups; hash join must full-scan dimension tables
confidence_rationale: Consistent across 8 queries with cost + wall-clock evidence
implication: Do NOT restructure joins that eliminate nested loop index lookups on dimension tables
